resources.string: Something went wrong when attempting to register device, please try again
The code you entered in not correct. Please try again.
Do you really want to cancel?
Enter the %1$s-digit code from the seed phrase owner
Tell seed phrase owner this %1$s-digit code to approve their access
Link you have opened does not appear to be correct. Please contact seed phrase owner
This application can only be used by invitation. Please click the invite link you received from the seed phrase owner.
You have been invited to become an approver!
Seed phrase owner has requested access approval
An error occurred while saving your Approver key. Please try again.
We need you to create and store your Approver key. This will be used to complete recovery if the owner loses their phrase.
Censo has encrypted the data with layered security.
To continue, the person you are assisting must send you a link.
Once you receive it, you can tap on it to continue.
Or, simply copy the link to the clipboard and paste using the button below.
Read aloud this 6-digit code only to the person you are assisting. Once they have successfully entered it, their identity will have been verified and the request approved.
Waiting for the code to be verified…
Incorrect code entered. Please try again.
The person you are assisting will give you a 6-digit code. Enter it below.
Failed to get invite from clipboard. Please try again.
Accepted as an approver. Let\'s get you verified.

For maximum security, it\'s best to be face-to-face with the phrase owner in a private location.\n\nThis ensures direct and private sharing of the necessary codes and information, reducing the risk of eavesdropping and interception.
In order to use the Approver app, we need to store access data in your Google Drive. Please continue
You\'ve been chosen by someone to help keep their crypto safe. Please tap the continue button when you\'re ready to begin helping them.
You\'re helping someone who trusts you keep their crypto safe.\n\nPlease tap the continue button when they contact you.
By tapping Sign in, you agree to our terms of use.
Thanks for helping someone keep their crypto safe.
You may now close the app.
If instead you\'re interested in using Censo to securely manage your own seed phrases, please follow

You are about to permanently delete your data and stop being an approver.

THIS CANNOT BE UNDONE!

The seed phrases you are helping to protect may become inaccessible if you confirm this action.

Are you sure?
This will securely delete all of your information stored in the app. After completing this, you will no longer be an approver. This operation cannot be undone.
View the people that you are an approver for.

Approving a request will take about 2 minutes. This approval should preferably take place while you\'re on the phone or in-person to ensure that you are assisting the proper individual.\n\nIn the next step you will verify the identity of the person you are assisting before approving the request.
Give this person a unique nickname so you can identify them.
If the person you are assisting has set you a link, you can tap on it to continue.
Get live with the person that contacted you.
This process should preferably take place while you’re on the phone or in-person to ensure that you are assisting the proper individual.
Please select the person that has contacted you:
Please send the login recovery link back to the person that has contacted you.
